channel.title: Chapter Unlocking system & 3D Backgrounds Don't Work Properly After Installing Maps
channel.description:
well, i installed BM:UPLINK & the XEN mod, went in face poser -> file -> rebuild scenes.image... and the two mods work fine, i even found a version of the last LC map that goes to the first XEN map (so i got the two maps, and, i haven't tested it, but i should get a smooth transition between the two chapters)... though here's my problem...
BM seams to be coded in such a way so that the chapter unlocking system only works with the main chapters that BM comes with... if i beat uplink, sometimes it unlocks all chapters besides the XEN ones, other times it doesn't unlock anything at all (uplink is viewed as chapter 0), a quick fix for this would be to go in autoexec.cfg, make a new line and go like -> sv_unlockedchapters 20, though i wander if it's possible to make the chapter system work as it does in vanilla (the xen chapters are viewed as 15, 16, 17, 18 & the credits chapter is 19)...
Another problem i have is that, uplink is chapter 0, though if i go to INBOUND, i get the 3D background from Anomalous Materials,if i go to Anomalous Materials, i get the background from Unforeseen Consequences, and so on... as a quick fix i can use this [url]https://blackmesa.gamebanana.com/guis/29614[/url] though i'd like to keep my 3D backgrounds in there (to bad uplink & the xen mod don't have 3D backgrounds)...
Any thoughts or fixes for all of this ?
Thanks :smiley:
